Question.Subject: Mozilla Firefox problem please help?
Question.Content: how to install Any color Adds-on I use this browser (Mozilla Firefox 3.6) but I can't install the any color How Can I install it?
Question.ChosenAnswer: hello. use this firefox link to get firefox 3.6themes ( called as personas). just go over it, you will see your firefox window change when you point your mouse in a purticular theme http://www.getpersonas.com/en-US/gallery/

Answer.Content: hello. use this firefox link to get firefox 3.6themes ( called as personas). just go over it, you will see your firefox window change when you point your mouse in a purticular theme http://www.getpersonas.com/en-US/gallery/
